##### FILE: config-maps3_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-conf:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |
    server {
        listen       80;
        server_name  localhost;

        location / {
            root   /usr/share/nginx/html;
            index  index.html index.htm;
        }


        # redirect server error pages to the static page /50x.html
        #
        error_page   500 502 503 504  /50x.html;
        location = /50x.html {
            root   /usr/share/nginx/html;
        }

        location /health {
            access_log off;
            return 200 "healthy\n";
        }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-conf
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: config-maps3_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/config-map-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: config-map-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: config-map-deployment
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: config-map-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - env && sleep 3600
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        image: busybox
        name: config-map-deployment-volume
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/order/nginx
          name: nginx-conf
        - mountPath: /etc/order/properties
          name: app-properties
        - mountPath: /etc/order/config
          name: config
      - args:
        - env & sleep 3600
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        env:
        - name: APP_VERSION
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: app-version
              name: app-properties
        - name: APP_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: app-name
              name: app-properties
        - name: APP_TEAM
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: team
              name: app-properties
        - name: NGINX_CONF
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: nginx.conf
              name: nginx-conf
        image: busybox
        name: config-map-deployment
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-conf
        name: nginx-conf
      - configMap:
          name: app-properties
        name: app-properties
      - name: config
        projected:
          sources:
          - configMap:
              name: nginx-conf
          - configMap:
              name: app-properties

---

##### FILE: config-observability-cm.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to tekton-pipelines/ConfigMap/config-observability:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  _example: |
    ################################
    #                              #
    #    EXAMPLE CONFIGURATION     #
    #                              #
    ################################

    # This block is not actually functional configuration,
    # but serves to illustrate the available configuration
    # options and document them in a way that is accessible
    # to users that `kubectl edit` this config map.
    #
    # These sample configuration options may be copied out of
    # this example block and unindented to be in the data block
    # to actually change the configuration.

    # metrics.backend-destination field specifies the system metrics destination.
    # It supports either prometheus (the default) or stackdriver.
    # Note: Using stackdriver will incur additional charges
    metrics.backend-destination: prometheus

    # metrics.request-metrics-backend-destination specifies the request metrics
    # destination. If non-empty, it enables queue proxy to send request metrics.
    # Currently supported values: prometheus, stackdriver.
    metrics.request-metrics-backend-destination: prometheus

    # metrics.stackdriver-project-id field specifies the stackdriver project ID. This
    # field is optional. When running on GCE, application default credentials will be
    # used if this field is not provided.
    metrics.stackdriver-project-id: "<your stackdriver project id>"

    # metrics.allow-stackdriver-custom-metrics indicates whether it is allowed to send metrics to
    # Stackdriver using "global" resource type and custom metric type if the
    # metrics are not supported by "knative_revision" resource type. Setting this
    # flag to "true" could cause extra Stackdriver charge.
    # If metrics.backend-destination is not Stackdriver, this is ignored.
    metrics.allow-stackdriver-custom-metrics: "false"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  annotations:
    meta.helm.sh/release-name: tekton-pipeline
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: resolvers
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: default
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: tekton-pipelines
    gitops.jenkins-x.io/pipeline: namespaces
  name: config-observability
  namespace: tekton-pipelines

---

##### FILE: config-pod-2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/config-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: config-pod
  name: config-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - sleep 3600
    env:
    - name: FIRST_NAME
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: name
          name: simple-config
    - name: PORT_NUMBER
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: portNumber
          name: simple-config
    image: busybox
    name: config
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /config
      name: config
      readOnly: true
  volumes:
  - configMap:
      items:
      - key: settings.env
        path: local.env
      name: simple-config
    name: config

---

##### FILE: config-pv.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to media/PersistentVolume/config-pv:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: config-pv
  namespace: media
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteMany
  capacity:
    storage: 3Gi
  csi:
    driver: driver.longhorn.io
    fsType: ext4
    volumeAttributes:
      numberOfReplicas: "3"
      staleReplicaTimeout: "2880"
    volumeHandle: existing-longhorn-volume
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Delete
  storageClassName: longhorn
  volumeMode: Filesystem

---

##### FILE: config-server-deployment3_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/selmag-config-server-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: selmag-config-server
  name: selmag-config-server-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: selmag-config-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: selmag-config-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --logging.level.org.springframework.security=TRACE
        env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: git, k8s
        - name: LOKI
          value: http://loki-svc.selmag.svc.cluster.local:3100
        image: 192.168.49.1:5000/selmag/config-server:0.0.1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: selmag-config-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8888
      - args:
        - -promscrape.config=/etc/opt/vmagent/promscrape.yaml
        - -remoteWrite.url=http://vm-svc.selmag.svc.cluster.local:8428/api/v1/write
        - -remoteWrite.label=instance=$(NODE_NAME)
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: victoriametrics/vmagent:v1.93.12
        name: vmagent
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/opt/vmagent
          name: vmconfig
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: config-server-vmagent-cm
        name: vmconfig

---

##### FILE: config-service_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to cctns-new/StatefulSet/psa-config-server-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: psa-config-server-app
  namespace: cctns-new
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: psa-config-server-app
  serviceName: psa-config-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: psa-config-server-app
        dedicated: master
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CONFIG_SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: config_server_address
              name: psa-config-cm
        - name: APPLICATION_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: SPRING_CLOUD_CONFIG_SERVER_GIT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: git-cred
        - name: SPRING_CLOUD_CONFIG_SERVER_GIT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: git-cred
        - name: ACTIVE_PROFILE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: ACTIVE_PROFILE
              name: active-profile
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Kolkata
        image: docker-registry:5000/psa-config-server:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: psa-config-server-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8989
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /root/logs
          name: logs-volume
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: reg-cred-secret
      serviceAccount: cctns
      serviceAccountName: cctns
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /Data_NAS_NEW/microservice-log/config
          type: ""
        name: logs-volume

---

##### FILE: config-trusted-resources-cm.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to tekton-pipelines/ConfigMap/config-trusted-resources:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  _example: |
    ################################
    #                              #
    #    EXAMPLE CONFIGURATION     #
    #                              #
    ################################
    # This block is not actually functional configuration,
    # but serves to illustrate the available configuration
    # options and document them in a way that is accessible
    # to users that `kubectl edit` this config map.
    #
    # These sample configuration options may be copied out of
    # this example block and unindented to be in the data block
    # to actually change the configuration.

    # publickeys specifies the list of public keys, the paths are separated by comma
    # publickeys: "/etc/verification-secrets/cosign.pub,
    # gcpkms://projects/tekton/locations/us/keyRings/trusted-resources/cryptoKeys/trusted-resources"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  annotations:
    meta.helm.sh/release-name: tekton-pipeline
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: default
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: tekton-pipelines
    gitops.jenkins-x.io/pipeline: namespaces
  name: config-trusted-resources
  namespace: tekton-pipelines

---

##### FILE: config-updater-du.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/oai-ip-du:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: oai-ip-du
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: oai-ip-du
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: oai-ip-du
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NODE_TYPE
          value: du
        - name: IP_CONFIGMAP_NAME
          value: oai-ip-config
        - name: GNB_CONFIGMAP_NAME
          value: du-config
        - name: CONFIGMAP_NAMESPACE
          value: default
        image: krsnucc21/config-updater
        name: oai-ip-du
      serviceAccountName: config-updater-sa

---

##### FILE: config-var.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/mypod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: mypod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - echo $(LEVEL) $(TYPE)
    env:
    - name: LEVEL
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: special.level
          name: myconfig
    - name: TYPE
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: special.type
          name: myconfig
    image: busybox
    name: busybox
  restartPolicy: Never

---
